QuestData.Title: Frederick's Fish Fancy
QuestData.Description: I love the sea. Yes, it was I, Frederick Calston, who introduced the sea life to that lake in the southwest. I had hoped to provide the Crusade with a source of fresh food from within the borders of the Plaguelands.$b$bHowever, some of the fish turned out to be predators, and they now terrorize the other animals. If we're not careful, they will kill them all!$b$bSwim down to the bottom of the scar and save some snails, crabs, and pufferfish before it's too late.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 8 Plague Puffers, 8 Infectis Inchers, and 8 Infectis Scuttlers from the Infectis Scar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did... did you bring the fish?
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm... they didn't survive the trip out of the water as well as I had hoped.$b$bOh well! Seafood salad for Frederick tonight!
